name: AlertMedia Pro
description: Employers already using the AlertMedia platform to quickly and securely deliver their mass communications can access the AlertMedia mobile app to stay connected to their audience from anywhere.   For emergency mass notifications, business communication, and operations and logistics, the AlertMedia app provides an additional way to facilitate and manage two-way conversations with any-sized audience. With an intuitive experience and design, app users can, with one tap, send a notification or apply a pre-built template, request a read receipt, solicit feedback via survey, or bridge an immediate voice conferencereaching their audience over text, voice call, email, and app push notification. Users are able to easily manage incoming messages and responses to notifications from one streamlined view.   Organizations can give their communications subscribers access to the app, empowering people to signal for help with their location automatically attached, send in messages, or reply to notifications directly from the app.   The AlertMedia app monitors your communications, your people, and other critical events that may impact your business or people. Employers and subscribers can receive customized alerts from third-party sources that our team curates and delivers to you via the app.
